cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false

packages:
  - python3
  - python3-pip
  - docker.io
  - chrony

write_files:
  - path: /usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
    permissions: '0755'
    owner: root:root
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      exec >> /var/log/post-deploy.log 2>&1
      echo "post deploy running"

      systemctl enable docker
      systemctl restart docker

      if id ubuntu >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        usermod -aG docker ubuntu
      fi

      echo "net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" > /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf
      sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf

      python3 -m pip install docker

      systemctl restart chrony

  - path: /etc/systemd/system/post-deploy.service
    permissions: '0644'
    owner: root:root
    content: |
      [Unit]
      Description=Post deploy setup
      After=network-online.target docker.service
      Wants=network-online.target

      [Service]
      Type=oneshot
      ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
      RemainAfterExit=yes

      [Install]
      WantedBy=multi-user.target

runcmd:
  - systemctl daemon-reload
  - systemctl enable post-deploy.service
name: kolla
